resources.string: This app helps DJs manage their music metadata and keep personal notes on individual tracks. Our beautiful background image photo is by Ardian Lumi on Unsplash.

Tap Search to find your track. You\'ll see results from MusixMatch\'s database of music track metadata. Tap a title to display the form to create a personal record for that song. Label your music with the type of dance event you\'ll play it at, songs to pair it with, whether you own it already or want to add it to a wish list, BPM, and more. Save to your database, hosted by Firebase. You can also create your own records by tapping Add.
Didn\'t find what you were looking for? Try a more specific search. Results capped at 100.
